transpose a dataframe

Source: R/dataframe.R
tdf.Rd

transpose a dataframe

Usage

tdf(x, colnames = NULL)

Arguments

x

dataframe

colnames

column names of the transposed dataframe

Value

dataframe

Examples


x <- c2r(mini_diamond, "id")
tdf(x)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 101
#>   item    `id-1` `id-2` `id-3` `id-4` `id-5` `id-6` `id-7` `id-8` `id-9` `id-10`

#> 4 price   " 302… 11746  " 202… " 945… " 249… 14080  "  75… " 102… " 559… " 1691"
